Articles.Content:
EDIT:  I found the culprit:  Mission Controller 2

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I have 63 mods installed.  Somewhere, somehow, I clicked a setting that displays this info in the Flight window.  I want to remove it.  I believe it may be the cause of another problem as well.  This is in my current career game.

When I start a new game (career or sandbox), this is not displayed.  So, there is a setting in my current game's persistent.sfs that is causing this to display.  I've looked through the settings for all my mods ingame and have found nothing that helps.

I've tried starting with a clean GameData folder:  Squad, Squad Expansions.  And added mods in a few at a time into a new game.  This display does not happen.

So, do you recognize this from one of the mods you use?  Thank you.

 

Edited March 22, 2018 by Apollo13
shorten the entry, having found the culprit
I'm reasonably sure it's from :

And, the offending mod is...Mission Controller 2.

I did another method of eliminating and adding mods individually (having done several before the OP), and I located Mission Controller 2 as the culprit.

Moderators:  feel free free to close this thread.  We're done here.

Edited March 22, 2018 by Apollo13
